select r.ID_SLAVE as slaveId, r.HOST_NAME as hostName, r.`PORT` as port, r.USERNAME as username, r.PASSWORD as password from r_slave r where r.HOST_NAME=#{hostName}

select r.NAME as name, r.WEB_APP_NAME as webappName, r.MASTER as master, r.ID_SLAVE as slaveId, r.HOST_NAME as hostName, r.`PORT` as port, r.USERNAME as username, r.PASSWORD as password from r_slave r WHERE 1=1
AND r.ID_SLAVE IN ( select ID_SLAVE from d_user_group_slaves_relation where USER_GROUP_NAME=#{0} )
